Text: Boston Gas Dealpst Ruth Chris Fitz Frank Vickers has asked me to set up a meeting for us to discuss the Boston Gas situation how we can restructure upstream andor downstream the deal what positions are struggling on the North American side what is our current position etc Ruth and Chris the abovementioned time is just a suggestion Loftus and I are fairly flexible for the remainder of today andor tomorrow except am and pm tomorrow Please let me know if another time will work better for either of you Basically we need you to please lay out for us some of the history behind the deal address some of the issues mentioned previously and help brainstorm how Loftus and I can go forward from this point Thanks very much for your help Jim Willis ENA East Gas Origination

FW Boston Gas DealPST Original Appointment From Willis Jim Sent Wednesday August PM To Willis Jim Concannon Ruth Germany Chris Fitzwater Loftus Subject Boston Gas Deal When Thursday August PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where Frank Vickers Conference Room Ruth Chris Fitz Frank Vickers has asked me to set up a meeting for us to discuss the Boston Gas situation how we can restructure upstream andor downstream the deal what positions are struggling on the North American side what is our current position etc Ruth and Chris the abovementioned time is just a suggestion Loftus and I are fairly flexible for the remainder of today andor tomorrow except am and pm tomorrow Please let me know if another time will work better for either of you Basically we need you to please lay out for us some of the history behind the deal address some of the issues mentioned previously and help brainstorm how Loftus and I can go forward from this point Thanks very much for your help Jim Willis ENA East Gas Origination

Asset Management ComGasPST Would like to meet about asset management per Frank Vickers Louise Kitchen has requested a presentation from Frank andor myself for Tuesday of next week Basically would like to walk through an example eg ComGas to illustrate why the manner in which the desk is structured and the way in which different desks liquidate to one another prevent asset optimization for Enron as a whole Thanks very much Jim Willis East Gas Origination
